DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate persistence hepatitis A antibody , approximately 8 year 10 year post vaccination complete series Havrix ( 2 dos ) partial series completion ( 1 dose ) .
DOC.brief_title: This Study Will Evaluate Persistence Hepatitis A Antibodies , 8 Years 10 Years Later , Children Who Had Received Havrix Selected Health Centres Panama 2007-2008
DOC.detailed_description: The study comprise two independent cross-sectional survey ( Year 8 Year 10 ) . The first cross-sectional serosurvey evaluate long term persistence immunity approximately 8 year post vaccine administration second cross-sectional study evaluate long term persistence , approximately 10 year post vaccine administration .
DOC.criteria: Subjects whose parent ( ) / LAR ( ) , opinion investigator , comply requirement protocol . Written inform assent/consent obtain subject subject 's parent ( ) / LAR ( ) subject . Children bear 1st January 2005 31st December 2007 . Available HAV vaccination record . Children receive either 1 two dos Havrix select health centre Panama . Children ≥ 7 year < 9 year last dose Persistence Visit 1 ( Year 8 ) child ≥ 9 year < 11 year last dose Persistence Visit 1 ' ( Year 10 ) . Child care Subjects history vaccination hepatitis A vaccine Havrix . Subjects know past history hepatitis A infection , without vaccination receive last dose Havrix ( 1 dose complete 2 dose schedule ) .
